scripts.ci-build: yarn production-compile && yarn generate-licenses && yarn copy-katex && zola build && yarn minify && yarn postcss && yarn unique
scripts.minify: yarn minify:html && yarn minify:svg && yarn run minify:png && yarn run minify:jpeg
scripts.minify:jpeg: find public/ -regex '.*/.*\.jp[eg]?' -exec sh -c 'cp "$0" "$0.tmp" && jpegtran -optimize -progressive -copy none "$0.tmp" > $0 && rm "$0.tmp"' {} \;
scripts.unique:css: export DATE=$(date +%s) && mv public/main.css public/main-$DATE.css && find public -name '*.html' -exec sed -i "s/main\.css/main-$DATE.css/" {} + && find public -name '*.html' -exec sed -i "s/integrity=sha256-.* rel=stylesheet/integrity=\"sha256-$(shasum -b -a 256 public/main-* | awk '{ print $1 }' | xxd -r -p | base64)\" rel=stylesheet/" {} +
scripts.unique:js: export DATE=$(date +%s) && mv public/js/main.js public/js/main-$DATE.js && find public -name '*.html' -exec sed -i "s/js\/main\.js/js\/main-$DATE.js/" {} + && find public -name '*.html' -exec sed -Ei "s/ integrity=sha256-.{44}><\/script>/ integrity=\"sha256-$(shasum -b -a 256 public/js/main-* | awk '{ print $1 }' | xxd -r -p | base64)\" rel=stylesheet/" {} +
scripts.production-compile: cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack --config webpack.prod.config.js && tsc --outFile ts/compress.js ts/compress.ts
scripts.domain: sed -i "s/base_url\s=\s\".*\"$/base_url = \"https:\/\/$DOMAIN\"/" config.toml && sed -i "s/base_domain\s=\s\".*\"$/base_domain = \"$DOMAIN\"/" config.toml && sed -i "s/\"start_url\":\s\".*\"/\"start_url\": \"https:\/\/$DOMAIN\"/" static/images/logo/site.webmanifest && echo "Formatted for domain $DOMAIN"
